name: Wood Block Puzzle Game
description:
Wood Block Puzzle is an addicting brain relax game with simple control and funny rules. This PUZZLE game have attract millions fans to play it. Challenge puzzle game fans with this exciting skill game that will keep you relax for all day.
Think you can handle our brain tease? Give it a try! This wood puzzle game is guaranteed to get you addicted! Different from other jigsaw games, Block Puzzle Wood is an addictive, simple but funny game. Available for people of all ages, from young kids to adults.
Drag & fill block into board. Once you fill in a vertical or horizontal line, it will be smash. You will meet new complex pieces when you get high scores.
Game will be over if there are no space for any given blocks below the board.

HOW TO PLAY
1. Simply drag the blocks to fill board.
2. Try to create full lines on the grid vertically or horizontally.
3.The more lines you smash, the higher score you will get.
4. Blocks can't be rotated.
5.Game will be over if there are no space for any given blocks below the board.

FEATURES
• Save game
• Support leaderboard
• Simple but funny
• Smooth and delicate animation
let's enjoy a simple and addictive puzzle game! Once you start, you'll be hooked.
